short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get focused for a period of time while it will block distracting sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get focused for a period of time while it will block distracting sites.

Besides, it will track your daily browser activities which show you the top 7 sites you are browsing with the time.
